name: Host (itch) (Detrivos)
description:
Host is a small and simple game made for GMTK Jam 2021.  It was our first Jam and we were all learning something new so we are still pretty proud of it.  

The game is yet unfinished.  During development, we aimed to create a game where you progress through different levels to reach a final objective.  There are still mechanics to implement and assets to create.

You have 6 health, how long can you last?

Controls:

 W,A,S,D to move 

 E to take over a person  

Left Click to shoot when you've taken over a person

People with break free after a short time

VibeToad - Pixel Art

Nazeroth - UI Art & Music

Detrivos - Programming
